meta.name: description
meta.value: Introduce how many items in the disambiguation list during paginated reading.

parameter.name: itemCount
parameter.description: The total number of shortcuts we are trying to read

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The number of shortcuts per page

parameter.name: customIntroductionPrompt
parameter.description: The custom prompt provided by the app, e.g. You have 7 items
